page_content:
Prolinx Ltd

Prolinx Cloud UK - SECURE

Prolinx Cloud UK - SECURE, is a Private Cloud Service that delivers a fully managed secure environment offering flexibility and scalability. This service offers many of the benefits of an Open Cloud with the additional reassurance of all levels of Government Security Classification Standards available.

Features

  • Multi-functional environment
  • Secure and highly scalable hosting service
  • Delivered as a fully managed end-to-end service
  • All levels of Government Security Classification Standards available
  • ISO9001, ISO20000, ISO27001 certified organisation and ITIL service management framework
  • Securely operated in UK by SC and DV Cleared Personnel
  • Supported 24x7x365
  • Option to access database, application and specialist support services

Benefits

  • Reduces cost and complexity of managing technology and resources
  • Can handle the highest levels of Government Security Classification Standards
  • Service available in the UK ONLY locations
  • Enabling secure remote working and migration to Cloud services
  • Increases operational efficiency through provision of Prolinx expertise
  • Collaborative working to achieve full security accreditation for your organisation

Pricing

£0.12 per virtual machine

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial option available
